text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street so bright
Neon signs and flashing lights
Skateboards glide on concrete waves
Dreams awake when daylight fades

[Verse 2]
Laughter echoes through the air
Cotton candy everywhere
Music from the cafes flow
Life's a breeze on Sunset glow

[Chorus]
Oh Sunset Boulevard
Where dreams ain't all that hard
Hearts light up like stars above
Find your tune and fall in love

[Verse 3]
Street performers strum and sing
Golden hour feels like spring
Shadows dance along the way
Colors blend at end of day

[Bridge]
Cars honking in harmony
City's pulse a symphony
Streetlights flicker start to guide
Night unfolds a magic ride

[Chorus]
Oh Sunset Boulevard
Where dreams ain't all that hard
Hearts light up like stars above
Find your tune and fall in love
title: Sunset Boulevard
